languages.text: "Теперь, когда с нами дитя Навис Нобилите, одной проблемой стало меньше. Что не может меня не радовать".
"Now that we have the Navis Nobilite child with us, that is one less problem for us to solve. I cannot help but be pleased about that."
languages.original_text: "Теперь, когда с нами дитя Навис Нобилите, одной проблемой стало меньше. Что не может меня не радовать".

traits.locale_text: "Now that we have the Navis Nobilite child with us, that is one less problem for us to solve. I cannot help but be pleased about that."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Now that we have the Navis Nobilite child with us, that is one less problem for us to solve. I cannot help but be pleased about that."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Now that we have the Navis Nobilite child with us, that is one less problem for us to solve. I cannot help but be pleased about that."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Now that we have the Navis Nobilite child with us, that is one less problem for us to solve. I cannot help but be pleased about that."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “如今，我们的队伍中有了导航宗族的子嗣，也就是说，我们要解决的问题又少了一个。我打心底为此感到高兴。”
languages.original_text: "Now that we have the Navis Nobilite child with us, that is one less problem for us to solve. I cannot help but be pleased about that."

traits.locale_text: “如今，我们的队伍中有了导航宗族的子嗣，也就是说，我们要解决的问题又少了一个。我打心底为此感到高兴。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Maintenant que nous avons l'enfant de la Navis Nobilite avec nous, ça nous fait un problème de moins à régler. Et ce n'est pas pour me déplaire. »
languages.original_text: "Now that we have the Navis Nobilite child with us, that is one less problem for us to solve. I cannot help but be pleased about that."

traits.locale_text: « Maintenant que nous avons l'enfant de la Navis Nobilite avec nous, ça nous fait un problème de moins à régler. Et ce n'est pas pour me déplaire. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Da wir nun das Kind der Navis Nobilite bei uns haben, müssen wir ein Problem weniger lösen. Ich kann nicht umhin, mich darüber zu freuen."
languages.original_text: "Now that we have the Navis Nobilite child with us, that is one less problem for us to solve. I cannot help but be pleased about that."

traits.locale_text: "Da wir nun das Kind der Navis Nobilite bei uns haben, müssen wir ein Problem weniger lösen. Ich kann nicht umhin, mich darüber zu freuen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「今や航宙貴族のご息女が共にいるのです、これで問題がひとつ解決しましたね。喜ばしいとしか言いようがありません」
languages.original_text: "Now that we have the Navis Nobilite child with us, that is one less problem for us to solve. I cannot help but be pleased about that."

traits.locale_text: 「今や航宙貴族のご息女が共にいるのです、これで問題がひとつ解決しましたね。喜ばしいとしか言いようがありません」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Ahora que la joven de la Navis Nobilite nos acompaña, tenemos un problema menos que resolver. Debo admitir que me alegro».
languages.original_text: "Now that we have the Navis Nobilite child with us, that is one less problem for us to solve. I cannot help but be pleased about that."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora que la joven de la Navis Nobilite nos acompaña, tenemos un problema menos que resolver. Debo admitir que me alegro».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Now that we have the Navis Nobilite child with us, that is one less problem for us to solve. I cannot help but be pleased about that."

languages.text: "Navis Nobilite'nin evladı artık aramızda olduğuna göre bir sorunumuzu daha çözdük demektir. Bu durumdan oldukça memnunum."
languages.original_text: "Now that we have the Navis Nobilite child with us, that is one less problem for us to solve. I cannot help but be pleased about that."

traits.locale_text: "Navis Nobilite'nin evladı artık aramızda olduğuna göre bir sorunumuzu daha çözdük demektir. Bu durumdan oldukça memnunum."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
